2.5-world-public/realms/glimmermere.html.title: Glimmermere
2.5-world-public/realms/glimmermere.html.description:
Infobox Name: Glimmermere Alias: Reality ​ The cosmic weave that holds all realms together; The vessel in which all gods, mortals, and planes exist;Glimmermere is a fragile veil stretched thin over the void. The gods claim it as their tapestry, but its threads fray, and every realm bleeds into the next. Those who gaze too long into its depths risk being gazed upon in turn. Content
Realms
History
Basic info
Purpose
Tone
ToDo List-History of GlimmermereName: Glimmermere Alias: Reality ​ The cosmic weave that holds all realms together; The vessel in which all gods, mortals, and planes exist;Glimmermere is a fragile veil stretched thin over the void. The gods claim it as their tapestry, but its threads fray, and every realm bleeds into the next. Those who gaze too long into its depths risk being gazed upon in turn.

Appearance and Environment
Looks
Phenomena
Inhabitants
Regions
History
Basic info
Purpose

2.5-world-public/realms/the-verdant-expa.title: The Verdant Expanse
2.5-world-public/realms/the-verdant-expa.description:
Infobox Name: The Verdant Expanse Alias: The First Garden ​ DM-The Verdant ExpanseWarm, welcoming, wholesome; It is a place of golden sunlight and eternal safety
Content
Appearance and Environment
Looks
Phenomena
Inhabitants
Regions
History
Basic info
Purpose
Tone Golden wheat fields that never diminish. Vast orchards where the fruit glows faintly at night. Rivers of clear green light, flowing in perfect circles. Skies locked in warm midsummer haze, with a sun that never truly sets. Endless Feast Food never rots and no guest leaves hungry Healing Fields Resting among the crops restores vitality and strength A single short rest will once per day give the benefits of a long rest; Blessed Waters Drinking from the rivers grants long life and health Races: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Individuals: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Harvestfolk Cheerful spirits of the grain who work tirelessly so none go hungry Hearthbound Fey Gentle guardians who ensure peace and welcome at every feast. Wanderers Fortunate wanderers rewarded with eternal joy and youth. Dataview: No results to show for table query.
ToDo List- HistoryName: The Verdant Expanse Alias: The First Garden ​
DM-The Verdant ExpanseWarm, welcoming, wholesome; It is a place of golden sunlight and eternal safety

2.5-world-public/realms/the-blooming-cou.title: The Blooming Court
2.5-world-public/realms/the-blooming-cou.description:
Infobox Name: The Blooming Court Alias: The Court of Flowers ​ Joyous, radiant, benevolent. It is a place of endless music, laughter, and refinement. All who enter are treated as honored guests at the grand banquet of eternity. Content
Appearance and Environment
Looks
Phenomena
Inhabitants
Regions
History
Basic info
Purpose
Tone Vast gardens filled with eternal blossoms, palaces of marble and living vines, perfumed air that heals the spirit, and golden skies lit by warm, soft light. Everywhere, flowers bloom in endless variety, each petal more beautiful than the last. Perfume of Harmony Conflict cannot take root here; anger melts into peace. Eternal Bloom No flower wilts, no garden fades, and every season’s beauty thrives all at once. Crown of Welcome Visitors are gifted garlands that protect them from harm while within the Court’s bounds. Races: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Individuals: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Flower Knights Gentle warriors sworn to defend beauty and peace. Petal Courtiers Spirits of blossoms who serve as attendants, entertainers, and diplomats. Favored Mortals Heroes, poets, and lovers rewarded with eternal bliss among the flowers. Dataview: No results to show for table query.
ToDo List- HistoryName: The Blooming Court Alias: The Court of Flowers ​ Joyous, radiant, benevolent. It is a place of endless music, laughter, and refinement. All who enter are treated as honored guests at the grand banquet of eternity.

2.5-world-public/realms/the-frostbound-m.title: The Frostbound Mire
2.5-world-public/realms/the-frostbound-m.description:
Infobox Name: The Frostbound Mire Alias: The Bitter Swamp ​ Hopeless, bitter, and desolate. It is a wasteland where nothing thrives and no comfort can be found. Content
Appearance and Environment
Looks
Phenomena
Inhabitants
Regions
History
Basic info
Purpose
Tone A frozen swamp stretching endlessly, with dead trees jutting like bones through ice-crusted waters. Gray skies loom overhead, and a chill fog clings to everything, draining both body and spirit. Chilling Mists - The fog numbs the body and steals memory, leaving only despair. Frozen Graves - The ground itself seems to claim the dead, pulling them beneath the ice. Wailing Winds - The air howls with sounds like the cries of lost souls. Races: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Individuals: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Pale Shades - Ghostly forms of those who wandered into the mire and never escaped. Mire Sentinels - Twisted Fey that guard the borders, keeping the living from straying too deep. Withered Mortals - Those trapped here, hollowed by grief and cold. Dataview: No results to show for table query.
ToDo List- HistoryName: The Frostbound Mire Alias: The Bitter Swamp ​ Hopeless, bitter, and desolate. It is a wasteland where nothing thrives and no comfort can be found.

2.5-world-public/realms/the-radiant-loom.title: The Radiant Loom
2.5-world-public/realms/the-radiant-loom.description:
Infobox Name: The Radiant Loom Alias: The Tapestry of Light ​ Serene, wondrous, and uplifting — a place of gentle light, music, and harmonious purpose. All who enter feel their lives blessed and orderly. Content
Appearance and Environment
Looks
Phenomena
Inhabitants
Regions
History
Basic info
Purpose
Tone Endless halls lined with golden threads that shimmer in sunlight, giant spools of radiant silk, and weaving stations attended by luminous figures. Light flows like liquid, reflecting off woven tapestries that depict histories, stories, and dreams in exquisite detail. Threads of Blessing - Mortals feel their lives guided toward prosperity and happiness. Loom of Harmony - Every action taken here is perfectly timed and measured, bringing peace to all involved. Shimmering Paths - Paths of glowing thread appear to guide visitors to the right decisions. Races: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Individuals: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Weavers of Fate - Luminous figures who tend the threads and ensure all stories remain beautiful. Tapestry Courtiers - Spirits who maintain the halls and entertain guests with visions of history and prophecy. Favored Visitors - Mortals who have impressed the Summer Crone and are honored with glimpses of their future. Dataview: No results to show for table query.
ToDo List- HistoryName: The Radiant Loom Alias: The Tapestry of Light ​ Serene, wondrous, and uplifting — a place of gentle light, music, and harmonious purpose. All who enter feel their lives blessed and orderly.

2.5-world-public/realms/the-umbral-holt..title: The Umbral Holt
2.5-world-public/realms/the-umbral-holt..description:
Infobox Name: The Umbral Holt Alias: The Shadowed Forest ​ Dark, ominous, and threatening — a place of dread where the slightest misstep invites misfortune or death. Content
Appearance and Environment
Looks
Phenomena
Inhabitants
Regions
History
Basic info
Purpose
Tone Twisted trees draped in black leaves, shadowed hollows, and dense mists that seem to move like living ravens. The sky is perpetually overcast, casting a chill across the ground. Black Wings - Dark ravens appear at random, heralding doom to those who linger. Whispered Warnings - Mysterious voices foretell misfortune and bloodshed. Shrouded Paths - Trails twist unpredictably, causing travelers to become lost and fearful. Races: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Individuals: Dataview: No results to show for table query. Black Ravens - Omens of death, guiding straying souls to misfortune. Shadowed Guardians - Fey who enforce the Morrígan’s wrath, punishing those who enter uninvited. Doomed Mortals - Those who wander into the Holt, believed to meet sudden ends or tragedy. Dataview: No results to show for table query.
ToDo List- HistoryName: The Umbral Holt Alias: The Shadowed Forest ​ Dark, ominous, and threatening — a place of dread where the slightest misstep invites misfortune or death.

info_showCustomIcons.description: Show custom icons for files and folders

info_showDefaultFolderIcons.description: Show a default icon of a folder for every folder in the tree

info_showDefaultFileIcons.description: Show a default icon of a file for every file in the tree

info_defaultFolderIcon.description: The icon to use for folders. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultFileIcon.description: The icon to use for files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultMediaIcon.description: The icon to use for media files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_exposeStartingPath.description: Whether or not to show the current file in the file tree when the page is first loaded

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_minCollapseDepth.description: Only allow outline items to be collapsed if they are at least this many levels deep in the tree.

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded

info_siteUrl.description: The url that this site will be hosted at

info_authorName.description: The name of the author of the site
